Reset.Title: Reset settings to default
Reset.Label: Reset Note Licker Settings
Reset.Hint: This will reset all of the module's settings back to their defaults.

LogLevel.Name: Log Level
LogLevel.Hint: The level of logs to place into the console.

EnableAnchorLinks.Name: Enable anchor links?
EnableAnchorLinks.Hint: Scene pins will be able to jump to anchors in the journals. Not currently compatible with Monks Enhanced Journals.

IconUploadDir.Name: Icon upload directory
IconUploadDir.Hint: The directory to upload icons to.

ResetSettings.Title: Note Licker | Reset Settings
ResetSettings.Content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the Note Licker module settings' to their defaults?
